entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
